Package: org.ajoberstar.gradle.git.release.base

[Groovy] Interface VersionStrategy

  • Strategy to infer a version from the project's and Git repository's state.

    See Also:
    SemVerStrategy
    Strategies

    • Methods Summary

        Methods 
        Type Name and description
        java.lang.String getName()
        The name of the strategy.
        ReleaseVersion infer(Project project, Grgit grgit)
        Infers the project version from the repository.
        boolean selector(Project project, Grgit grgit)
        Determines if the strategy should be used to infer the project's version.

    • Method Detail

      • java.lang.String getName()

        The name of the strategy.

        Returns:
        the name of the strategy

      • ReleaseVersion infer(Project project, Grgit grgit)

        Infers the project version from the repository.

        Returns:
        the inferred version
        Parameters:
        project - the project the version should be inferred for
        grgit - the repository the version should be inferred from

      • boolean selector(Project project, Grgit grgit)

        Determines if the strategy should be used to infer the project's version. A return of false does not mean that the strategy cannot be used as the default.

        Returns:
        true if the strategy should be used to infer the version
        Parameters:
        project - the project the version should be inferred for
        grgit - the repository the version should be inferred from
